post:
BMF Host - We think of ourselves as an ambitious team of IT-professionals with extensive experience in providing quality hosting for a wide range of needs. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals, and our approach is based on the traditional values of the business, such as honesty, hard work, patience, and, of course, supplemented by a tremendous experience of service. We have servers located in Romania.

NVMe SSD VPS with DDoS Protection packages:

Romania VPS I

  • 1 CPU Core

  • 20 GB SSD Space
  • 1 TB bandwidth
  • 1 Gbit port
  • 1 IPv4
  • KVM based
  • DDoS Protection Included (1Tbps+)
  • Remote Control Tools


Price: €12/mo + €5.00 Setup Fee

Order today!
